## Steps

- [ ] Themable (Component.base/Component.styles)
- [ ] Unit tests
- [ ] Visual tests
- [ ] Documentation and examples
- [ ] Keyboard Accessible
- [ ] High Constrast Support
- [ ] RTL Support
- [ ] Design Review
- [ ] API review
- [ ] Public Preview
- [ ] Ready for Publishing
